display_long_description:
# Early access special price, includes 12 different maps!

# The favorite toy is now in Mixed Reality! - 
- Enjoy exciting mazes, tracks, and an all-new arcade mode!
- Experience realistic physics that bring the ball to life in Mixed Reality!

# Use hand tracking to control the ball – no controllers needed!
[media]

# Arcade mode with maps only available in Mixed Reality!

[media]

# Speed run against other players around the world!

[media]

# Scale the ball to any size, move it around your room, and create your perfect gameplay setup.

[media]

# Interact with your loyal flying droid companion – or just annoy it for fun!

[media]

# Upcoming features - 
- **Level builder.**
- **Ball decals.**
- **And much more to come!!**

Early gameplay footage was captured on the Meta Quest 3.
